Uses of Package
nodebasis

  • Packages that use nodebasis 
    Package Description
    nodebasis  
    surrounding  
  • Classes in nodebasis used by nodebasis 
    Class and Description
    Event
    The Event class holds some specific details regarding an event, such as the time of occurrence and the id.
    ExpirationReader
    Classes extending this abstract class can be used in purpose of monitoring when a specific node discards an expired request or agent message.
    ExpirationReader.ReaderMode 
    Lifespan
    The Lifespan interface can be implemented by any classes whose instances should have an explicit lifespan, and where the control of that lifespan is important.
    Message
    A Message is a means for the a node to spread or fetch information between other nodes.
    Node
    The Node class resembles a wireless point.
    NodeState
    The NodeState enum describes the state of a Node.
    RequestMessage
    The RequestMessage class extends the Message class, and is defined by the sole purpose of fetching information regarding a specific event, on the request of a node.
    RequestReader
    Classes implementing this interface can be used in purpose of monitoring when a specific node retrieves an earlier sent message.
    Task
    The task class is used to associate an object with a specific (for a node) manageable action.
    TaskAction
    The enumeration TaskAction holds the various executable tasks a node can manage.
  • Classes in nodebasis used by surrounding 
    Class and Description
    Node
    The Node class resembles a wireless point.
